title: Support Engineer
subtitle: Fornova
description: At Fornova, one of our solutions is for the hospitality industry helping hotels increase their sales up to 30%. We help our customers make business decisions and effective pricing by comparing data that we scrape for them daily. Technologies that I use include Python, JavaScript, SQL and MongoDB.

title: Operations
subtitle: BPP University
description: Administering attendance reports for students and professors using Salesforce Dashboards. Supporting the attendance team by tracking and responding to Student Authorized Leave requests. Made scripts in Python that automated 50% of my job.

title: Software Engineering Intern
subtitle: Wiley Edge
description: Trained on full-stack development (Java, Spring Framework, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, JDBC, Maven, MVC, git, REST API). Developed a full-stack department store application and strengthened my presentation and communication.

title: Software Engineering Intern
subtitle: Express Publishing
description: Training on React by working with the front-end development team on building a new web platform for customers to access their books online. I implemented a lot of the front end requirements, by following the instructions of the UI designer. The new website has an updated e-shop with a custom made payment handling system and an updated look.

title: Software Engineering Intern
subtitle: Triton - Asset Management
description: Worked in a team where we designed scripts in Python that were used to monitor the companies’ customers’ investments. Triton works with high net worth individuals that use our services in order to manage their assets.

title: Software Engineering Intern
subtitle: Navarino Telecom
description: Strengthened my Python coding skills by effectively making the software changes required to fulfil the requirements specified by the CTO. The software monitored all the activity on the vessels including report support and communications. Worked on a software solution for vessels called Infinity where I added telecommunication logging information that vessels use to contact the shore. Each vessel that travels in the sea has a solution that tracks everything. This includes from the food supplies they have on board for the crew to what cargo they are transporting.

title: Cyber - Pen testing Intern
subtitle: Adacom Cyber Security
description: Used tools in Kali Linux to brute force, capture network traffic and decrypt information. Assisted the senior pen tester of the team to run social engineering attacks on companies as well as bruteforce them and find sql injections. This involved banking related companies that needed security.

title: Software Engineering Intern
subtitle: Agile Actors
description: Implemented the skills I gained at training at Agile Actors to build a game as part of the internship in React. The game was a tic tac toe, and its purpose was to teach us props, state, render and the dom.

title: GCSE
subtitle: St. Catherines British School
description: Lower School, Upper School and GCSE.
